duties_responsibilities.duty: Compile, manage, and execute attorney billing in the accounting department.
Review and bill attorney hours and disbursements to clients.
Apply retainer funds as directed by attorney.
Ability to understand Exception rates, Discounts, Multipayor, and Electronic Billing.
Handle high volume of bills per month.
Interact and communicate effectively with attorneys, secretaries, and clients.
Review and verify accuracy of billing and provide supporting documentation.
Research and respond to inquiries regarding billing issues.
Create billing reports and spreadsheets for analyses.
Assist in preparing documentation for exhibits in court.
Review and enter new Clients and Matters into the billing system.

education_certification.credential: College degree preferred. 5-7 years billing experience in a law firm environment preferred. Thorough knowledge of e-billing system(s) required.
